title: Explicit Congestion Notification
description: Explicit Congestion Notification (ECN) allows end-to-end notification of network congestion, avoiding packet drops. These observations test successful negotiation of ECN, as well as ECN-dependent connectivity and ECN IP signaling.

charts.title: ecn.connectivity
charts.description: Effect of attempts to negotiate ECN on end-to-end connectivity

descriptions.ecn.connectivity.works: Connectivity not dependent on attempt to negotiate ECN
descriptions.ecn.connectivity.broken: Attempt to negotiate ECN leads to connectivity failure
descriptions.ecn.connectivity.transient: Connectivity only with ECN negotiation; probable transient
descriptions.ecn.connectivity.offline: Target offline regardless of ECN connectivity

charts.title: ecn.stable.connectivity
charts.description: Stabilized ECN connectivity tests. Multiple measurements from the same vantage point are performed to each target.

descriptions.ecn.stable.connectivity.broken: ECN leads to connectivity failure on all attempts

charts.title: ecn.multipoint.connectivity
charts.description: Path dependency tests for ECN connectivity. Multiple measuremends from different vantage points to localize

descriptions.ecn.multipoint.connectivity.works: No path dependency, works from all vantage points
descriptions.ecn.multipoint.connectivity.broken: No path dependency, ECN leads to connectivity failure from all vantage points
descriptions.ecn.multipoint.connectivity.transient: No path dependency, transient from all vantage points
descriptions.ecn.multipoint.connectivity.path_depende: Clear evidence that ECN connectivity dependency is path-dependent
descriptions.ecn.multipoint.connectivity.unstable: No consensus on ECN-dependent connectivity from any vantage point
descriptions.ecn.multipoint.connectivity.offline: No path dependency, offline from all vantage points

charts.title: ecn.negotiation
charts.description: In this tests we tried to negotiate ECN with the target.

descriptions.ecn.negotiation.reflected: ECN negotiation reflects ECE CWR flags on SYN ACK

charts.title: ecn.stable.negotiation
charts.description: Stabilized ECN negotiation tests. Multiple measurements from the same vantage point are performed to each target.

descriptions.ecn.stable.negotiation.succeeded: ECN negotiation succeeded on all attempts
descriptions.ecn.stable.negotiation.failed: ECN negotiation failed on all attempts
descriptions.ecn.stable.negotiation.unstable: No consensus about negotiation across multiple observations

charts.title: ecn.multipoint.negotiation
charts.description: Multiple vantage point ECN negotiation tests.

descriptions.ecn.multipoint.negotiation.succeeded: ECN negotiation succeeded from all vantage points
descriptions.ecn.multipoint.negotiation.failed: ECN negotiation failed from all vantage points
descriptions.ecn.multipoint.negotiation.reflected: ECN negotiation reflected from all vantage points
descriptions.ecn.multipoint.negotiation.unstable: No consensus about ECN negotiation from any vantage point

charts.title: ecn.ipmark.ce
charts.description: Observations of the IP ECN CE codepoint

descriptions.ecn.ipmark.ce.seen: At least one CE mark observed
descriptions.ecn.ipmark.ce.not_seen: No CE marks observed; note, not tested on some earlier measurements

charts.title: ecn.ipmark.ect0
charts.description: Observations of the IP ECN ECT0 codepoint

descriptions.ecn.ipmark.ect0.seen: At least one ECT0 mark observed
descriptions.ecn.ipmark.ect0.not_seen: No ECT0 marks observed. NOTE: not tested on some earlier measurements

charts.title: ecn.ipmark.ect1
charts.description: Observations of the IP ECN ECT1 codepoint

descriptions.ecn.ipmark.ect1.seen: At least one ECT1 mark observed
descriptions.ecn.ipmark.ect1.not_seen: No ECT0 marks observed. NOTE: not tested on some earlier measurements
